title: User Authentication with Email/Password
description: Verify that users can successfully sign up, log in, log out, and recover password using email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to signup page and enter valid email and password
Submit signup form
Verify new account is created and user is redirected to onboarding dialogs
Log out from the application
Navigate to login page and input the registered email and password
Submit login form
Verify user is authenticated and navigated to main app
Navigate to forgot password page and request password reset with registered email
Verify password reset email is sent
Attempt login with invalid password
Verify login failure message is displayed

title: User Authentication with Google OAuth
description: Verify user can sign up and log in using Google OAuth authentication flow including onboarding dialogs.

steps.description: Click on Google OAuth login button
Complete OAuth authentication via Google consent screen
Verify user is redirected back and authenticated with onboarding dialogs shown
Log out from the application
Repeat Google OAuth login
Verify login is successful without duplicate user creation

title: AI-Powered Recipe Import from URL
description: Verify that inputting a valid recipe URL triggers AI parsing which extracts accurate ingredients, instructions, and cook times, then allows user review and saving.

steps.description: Navigate to recipe import page
Input a valid recipe URL
Submit import request
Verify AI parsing returns recipe ingredients, instructions, and cook times displayed for user review
Modify any recipe details as desired
Save the recipe to user’s collection
Verify recipe appears in user’s recipes list with correct details
Input invalid URL or non-recipe URL
Submit import request
Verify appropriate error message is shown and no recipe saved

title: Recipe CRUD Operations
description: Test creation, reading, updating, and deletion of recipes including offline support.

steps.description: Navigate to new recipe creation page
Enter all required fields for a recipe including title, ingredients, instructions, cooking time
Save the recipe
Verify the recipe appears in the recipes list
Open a saved recipe detail view
Verify all recipe details are correctly displayed
Edit recipe details and save changes
Verify changes are persisted and displayed correctly
Delete a recipe from the recipes list
Verify recipe is removed from the list and database
Attempt CRUD operations offline using PWA support
Verify offline operations queue and synchronize correctly when online

title: Collaborative Weekly Meal Planning and Drag-and-Drop Interface
description: Verify that users can collaboratively add recipes to weekly plan, assign cooks, adjust servings, drag and drop recipes between meal slots with real-time updates.

steps.description: User A navigates to meal planning page
User A drags a recipe card into a meal slot
Verify recipe appears in meal slot
User B (in same household) sees the update in real-time
Verify User B’s view updates to reflect User A’s changes
Assign cook to the meal slot and adjust number of servings
Verify cook assignment and serving adjustments are saved and visible to all collaborators
Drag recipe from one day/meal slot to another
Verify drag-and-drop seamlessly moves recipe with correct updates
Attempt drag-and-drop on mobile device
Verify drag-and-drop functionality works responsively on mobile UI

title: Automatic Shopping List Generation and Email Sending
description: Validate correct auto-generation of shopping lists from finalized meal plans with grocery categories and ability to email shopping lists.

steps.description: Finalize a weekly meal plan with multiple recipes
Generate shopping list from the meal plan
Verify shopping list accurately consolidates ingredients grouped by grocery categories
Check off items and adjust quantities in the shopping list
Verify adjustments persist and totals update accordingly
Send shopping list to user email
Verify shopping list email is received and formatted correctly
Attempt sending shopping list email with invalid email address
Verify error handling prevents email send and shows message

title: Cooking History Tracking and Recipe Ratings
description: Verify logging of cooking events and accurate user rating submissions that update recipe statistics.

steps.description: Start cooking a recipe from the recipe detail page
Verify cooking event is logged in cooking history
After cooking, submit a rating for the recipe
Verify recipe rating statistics are updated accordingly
View cooking history page
Verify cooking events and ratings are displayed with correct timestamps

title: Google Calendar Integration for Meal Plan Syncing
description: Ensure reliable syncing of meal plans to Google Calendar including OAuth token handling, successful event creation, and disconnection flow.

steps.description: Navigate to settings and connect Google Calendar via OAuth
Verify OAuth flow completes successfully and token is stored securely
Perform meal plan finalization with option to sync to Google Calendar
Verify meal plan events are created in the user’s Google Calendar
Attempt to sync when OAuth token is expired or revoked
Verify app prompts re-authentication or error handling
Disconnect Google Calendar integration from settings
Verify token and connection are removed and syncing disabled

title: PWA Offline Support for Core Features
description: Validate the app’s offline capabilities including recipe viewing, meal planning, and shopping list management with synchronization upon reconnect.

steps.description: Load the app in online mode and cache necessary assets
Go offline (disable network)
Navigate to previously loaded recipe detail page
Verify recipe details load correctly from cache
Add a recipe to a meal plan while offline
Mark items in shopping list while offline
Verify offline changes are queued and visible in the UI
Return online
Verify offline changes synchronize successfully with server and reflected for all collaborators

title: API Rate Limiting and Security Enforcement
description: Verify that API endpoints enforce rate limiting, row-level security, and proper authorization restrictions are applied.

steps.description: Send rapid consecutive API requests to key endpoints (e.g., recipe import, meal plan updates) exceeding rate limits
Verify that excessive requests are throttled with appropriate error responses
Attempt data modification on recipes or meal plans owned by another user
Verify API rejects unauthorized operations with access denied errors
Verify authorized user can only access and modify their own data or shared household data
Verify row level security policies are correctly enforced

title: GDPR Cookie Consent and Accessibility
description: Test GDPR-compliant cookie consent banner display, user acceptance process, and accessibility compliance across UI components.

steps.description: Load the application for the first time in a new browser session
Verify GDPR cookie consent banner is displayed
Attempt to interact with site before accepting consent
Verify site options are limited per GDPR compliance
Accept cookie consent
Verify consent is stored and banner no longer shown on subsequent visits
Navigate all major UI components using keyboard navigation and screen readers
Verify UI is fully accessible, with meaningful ARIA attributes and focus management

title: Theme Management with Dark Mode Toggling
description: Verify that users can toggle between light and dark themes and theme preference persists across sessions.

steps.description: Navigate to the main application
Verify default theme is applied based on system or previous preference
Toggle dark mode switch to enable dark theme
Verify UI theme changes to dark mode instantly
Reload the app
Verify dark mode setting persists after reload
Toggle back to light mode and verify changes
